issue.title: [R][Dataset] Allow create dataset from vector of file paths
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12082](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12082). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the R bindings allow creating of a Dataset from a _directory_ path. Enable creating a Dataset from a _file_ path or vector of file paths.
